description: Here at Goonhammer, we know that it’s hard to keep track of all the news happening all the time in the games industry. So much is always going on with games of all sorts, and their related media, it can be a real blink-and-you’ll miss it situation.  That’s why every week, we round up five […]
title: Games Industry News Roundup- October 28th, 2024

description: We take a deep look at the new Crusade of Faith rules for the Sisters of Battle in White Dwarf 505, talking about how they work and who they're for.
title: White Dwarf #505 Crusade of Faith Rules Review

description: You know we’re huge fans of The Silver Bayonet, Don’t Look Back, and other horror games – now let’s take a look at some of the films that have inspired us! The Goonhammer Historicals team writes up summaries of some of our favorite historical horror films that you can check out on most streaming services. […]
title: Ghoulhammer Historicals: The Best Historical Adjacent Horror Films

description: Terry Pratchett’s Discworld RPG: Adventures in Ankh-Morpork, a brand new Discworld game, is headed our way soon from Modiphius Entertainment. It’s currently crowd funding via kickstarter until November 7th, so let’s check out the quickstart rules so you’ll know if you want to put down your cash for all those kickstarter-exclusive goodies. The Basicks The […]
title: Discworld Quick Start Guide – A Goonhammer Reviewe

description: Hey everybody, for today’s How to Paint Everything we have one of the new faces of X-Men ’97, Sunspot! This solar powered mutant absorbs the power of the Sun and then unleashes fiery blasts on his enemies. Sunspot’s model has to be one of my favorite of the line, the flame blast effect is awesome. […]
title: How to Paint Everything: Marvel Crisis Protocol – Sunspot

description: Fresh off of their GameholeCon Experience, the guys gather to talk about the sights, sounds, and coffee of GameholeCon. They also check in on the Unknown Worlds Backerkit (Hint: It’s fantastic), and Troy provides his account of two recent events in D&D’s hometown of Lake Geneva, Dragon Days and Dragon Fall. Come along for the […]
title: Playin and Slayin #84 | GameholeCon, Dragon Fall, Dragon Days
